title: DevOps & Cloud
summary: My DevOps approach focuses on automated CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud-native architecture to ensure reliable, scalable applications with minimal operational overhead.
content:
My DevOps philosophy centers on automation, reliability, and scalability:

  • GitHub Actions allows me to create efficient CI/CD pipelines that automatically test, build, and deploy applications with every code change. This ensures consistent quality and rapid delivery.
  • Azure DevOps provides comprehensive tooling for the entire application lifecycle, from planning to monitoring. I've used it to implement blue/green deployments and build robust release pipelines.
  • Docker enables consistent environments across development, testing, and production. By containerizing applications, I can ensure they run reliably anywhere while simplifying deployment and scaling.

I believe effective DevOps is about creating a streamlined path from development to production that maintains quality while reducing friction. By automating repetitive tasks and implementing infrastructure as code, I can focus more time on creating value through new features and improvements rather than operational overhead.
